text: Mme mo ga utlwala sentle mo phuthegong yotlhe, mme ba tlhopha ba ba latelang: Setefane, (monna yo o tletseng tumelo le Mowa O O Boitshepo), Filipo, Porokoro, Nikanore, Timone, Paramenase, Nikolase wa Antioka (Modichaba yo o sokologetseng mo tumelong ya Sejuta, yo o rileng la bofelo a sokologela mo Bokereseteng).
